Immortal Game represents the first ever free-to-play and play-and-earn version of chess with a built-in earning mechanism, and our mission is simple ‚Äì provide existing chess players with the most nuanced and variable experience available coupled with financial rewards for their skills, while simultaneously introducing the game to an entirely new audience of investors and DeFi / GameFi enthusiasts.

Built on the Ethereum network, the project is available for both mobile phones and PCs, and whilst we were passionate about keeping the core rules of the gameplay unchanged, we have introduced an exciting new element, which will allow players to access fun features and new ways to play that will enhance the gaming experience, as well as maximize earning potential.

name: G-Mode Archives+: Mikuni Field Combat
description:
Near-future weapons hit the world of the Three Kingdoms!
Capture famous heroes and great heroes and invade the world of war!

Released for feature phones in 2007, "Mikuni Field Combat" is a spin-off of Jaleco's shooter game "Field Combat," released for arcades and the Family Computer in 1985.

"Field Combat" is a strategic shooter game in which you control the futuristic UFO-type attack aircraft carrier "Genesis-3" and capture enemy units with a capture beam to use them as allies while trying to clear stages.
For some reason, this futuristic weapon, the "Genesis-3," is storming into the world of "Romance of the Three Kingdoms" at the end of the 2nd century!

The system of capturing enemies with a capture beam and using them as allies remains the same, but more than 130 popular generals familiar to fans of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms appear!

Recruit your favorite generals to your side and survive the wars of mainland China, where intrigue is rife!

Operate the futuristic UFO-type attack aircraft carrier "Genesis-3", defeat enemy infantry and obstacles, recruit your favorite generals as your allies, and aim to conquer the stage! Can you survive the wars of mainland China, where political intrigue is swirling?

Capture enemy generals and make them your allies. Use the capture beam to capture enemies and make them your allies! More than 130 popular generals familiar to fans of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms appear!

Use your allies' unique strategies to gain an advantage in battle!
Each captured general has a strategy (special move) that will help you. Figure out when to use it and advance the battle more advantageously!

Operate the attack mobile aircraft carrier Genesis-3 to occupy the enemy castle at the top of the map. Damage the boss enemy, who is always present on each side, and defeat, capture, or force them to retreat, and the castle gate will open. Enter the castle gate that Genesis-3 opens to proceed to the next stage.

Also, if you damage famous generals, including boss enemies, and weaken their remaining vitality to 30%, a "GET!" message will appear above them, and you will be able to capture them with a capture beam. You can make captured generals your allies after clearing the stage. Capture all the strong enemies and make them your allies to create your own strongest army (you can have up to 14 generals). If your ship, Genesis-3, loses its vitality or the time limit runs out, it will be destroyed and the game will be over. Allied generals who are incapacitated in battles on each stage will not be lost, and will be revived in the next stage or when you continue.

All allied generals always have one "strategy." A strategy is a powerful technique that can only be activated once per stage.
When the strategy you want to use is lit up in the bottom right of the screen, press the strategy button at the right time to change the course of the battle.
Only one strategy can be active at a time, and when a new strategy is activated, the previous one will be overwritten.
Continuous strategies last for about 30 seconds, and damage-dealing strategies have the following expected damage value: Water Strategy > Fire Strategy > Ambush Strategy.

Each general has a rarity, and is ranked in the following order: GR (Greater Rare) > R (Rare) > S (Special) > N (Normal).
The higher the rarity of a general, the less likely they are to appear randomly (as a general excluding bosses), but you can expect a higher level of ability.

description: Take on a brand new Seasonal Campaign inspired by the legendary wars and heroes of Medieval France. Begin your campaign in the starting region of the Borderlands, and keep the Loegrians at bay from glorious Pays-de-la-Gloire. Do battle in twice-weekly Territory Wars with your House, complete Stages, and keep the faith during the final struggle in Augolia at the end of the Season.

name: For Honor: Season 21 - Golden Age
description:
New visitors from far away have unveiled the lost reliquary of Wyverndale. Now, treasures long forgotten have been made available to warriors once more. From the ancient past of Heathmoor comes old weapons that once again glisten in the light of day. Arm yourself with the blades of Heathmoor‚Äôs original warriors, and fight like the forebears of old.

Take your character on a quest back to the Golden Age with 100 Tiers of rewards for all heroes! Available during For Honor: Golden Age only.

name: Monster Energy Supercross: The Official Videogame 5 - Special Edition
description: Hold on fast to the handlebar of your bike because a new chapter of the series has finally arrived. Try Monster Energy Supercross - The Official Videogame 5 and discover the quintessence of indoor supercross!

name: The Tale of Onogoro
description:
Experience communication with a virtual character in a VR title developed as "an adventure game for the VR age."
Work with Haru to deactivate the large, puzzle-like barriers blocking your path. Teamwork is key, as some objects can only be used by one of you!

name: The Textorcist: Amen Edition
description:
The The Textocist: Amen Edition includes:

- The Textorcist
- The Textorcist: The Village DLC
- The Textorcist Original Soundtrack by Gost
- The Textorcist: The Village DLC Original Sountrack by Carbon Killer

name: My Lady Sayo: Zettai Kunshu! Sayo-sama
description: This is a novel game in which you serve Sayo and deepen your relationship with her as you respond to her reckless requests and endure her playful teasing.

name: Arcade Archives: Rolling Thunder
description: Rolling Thunder is an action game released by Namco in 1986. Control the hero and infiltrate the secret base of the Geldra secret society as they plot to dominate the globe. Experience a hard-boiled adventure with a smart hero in the lead. This title contains three versions, each with slightly different content.

name: Neon Outlast
description: This is a Challenging FPS game which you can act as a soldier, who lost in the slum and surrounded by terrorists, all you have to do is breakthrough all the enemies and escape in the limited time.

name: Poly Memory: Birds
description: Cute, relaxing, polygonal memory game with birds.

name: Pirate's Solitaire
description: Outwit the old sea dog and seize the pirates' gold! Play solitaire right on the deck of the reavers' ship.

name: One By One
description: One By One is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: HyperPortals
description: Read the text, answer questions, control the beam of light rushing through the void, collect parts of the story - "Hyper Portals" offers a journey into several dimensions at once.

name: The Reflection
description: The Reflection explores the connection to an alternate dimension that contains all the matter of the world inverted. From the surface, there appears to be simply a reflection of light, but submerging into the water reveals that this world is completely tangible, mirroring the world perfectly.

name: Holiday Jigsaw Christmas
description: HO HO HO! Unforgettable adventure waits you in Holiday Jigsaw! Start your journey with a Merry Christmas!

name: The Textorcist: The Village
description: Follow Ray Bibbia 10 years in the past in this adventure set in a small village where religion is considered only a fad of the past. Unveil the mystery that lurks in Castel di Vania and get ready to face ancient demons with only the help of your trusty bible and your typing skills.

name: Smash Slug
description: Smash Slug is a massive multiplayer party game with 60 contestants. There will be only one winner and all prize money will be his.

name: Immortals: Muv-Luv Alternative
description:
Immortals: Muv-Luv Alternative is a mobile game from the "Muv-luv" series, released on both iOS and Android exclusively in Japan.

The setting of the game inherits the worldview and the story background of the original work "Muv-luv", which is a visual novel of love comedy in the first chapter, then becomes a serious sci-fi adventure story. Players need to control the popular characters from the series and Tactical Surface Fighters (TSF), a kind of large bipedal machine, to fight against a mysterious swarm of alien creatures called "Beta", as they have invaded and disrupted the Earth. All the stories narrated in the game are completely new and original. Players can enjoy a riveting plot with an intense atmosphere and charismatic characters.

name: Trivial Pursuit Live! 2
description:
Challenge other players from all around the world or compete against your streaming viewers on Twitch.

With hundreds of new questions, adapted level of difficulties, and a diverse line-up of characters, everyone can join the party and enjoy the thrill of a fast-paced TV show experience. Take your place on stage to showcase your knowledge and face off against friends and family to collect as many wedges as you can to take home the win!

name: The Wake
description: Explore a generational curse that has swallowed a man and his life.

name: T3 Arena
description: T3 Arena is a fast-paced, easy-to-learn 3v3 shooter. Team up with your friends and charge into battle from your mobile device - anytime, anywhere! Tons of unique heroes, exciting game modes, and effortless auto-firing weapons all await you in the thrilling competitions of the T3 League!

name: Hanna Must Run
description:
The game have many levels that you can open by finding cakes.
To defeat enemies you need to jump or beat them.
At the levels you can find many useful bonuses like shoes that allow you to run fast, a turtle cap that protects against physical attacks, glasses that show the hidden, etc.
The more cakes you find, the better the bonuses work.

name: VR Training: Hot Work
description: Hot Work VR Training Train your professional skills in Hot Work VR Training safely and in full correspondence with international standards! In the VR simulator, you will ensure a number of safety measures before starting work.

name: Instant Artist: Puzzle Mashup
description: Express your art by mixing pieces from different puzzles!

name: Elemental Angel II
description: "Elemental Angel II" is a vertical scrolling flight shooting game. The player controls the protagonist fighter to fight the enemy in the universe.

name: The Tree
description: The Tree is a minimalist building and puzzle game in which you recover a forest after natural disaster on floating islands high in the sky.

name: World Titans War
description:
Tactical survival inspired by WWII.
The action is guaranteed from the first moment. You will start out as a civilian forced to seek resources to survive, you will be able to join an army and fight, with or without allies. In time of war there will be no mercy.

name: Donut Arena
description: Where hunger prevails, a tournament is organized. There is only one rule: eat them all. Donut Arena is an action game that can't be tamed without smart planning. Try your best to please the kings, hype the crowd, conquer underwears and the gods shall answer the call.

name: Epics of Distant Realm 2: Holy Return
description: It is the continuation of the game, which was first published in 2006 on many game sites and announced its name with different names such as "Village Wizard". You will get to know the Far Realm Universe better with brand new experiences and mechanics.

name: Startenders: Intergalactic Bartending
description: Startenders: Intergalactic Bartending is a VR bartending game set in space. Let loose with a cocktail shaker, a collection of mad machinery, and an abundance of crazy ingredients to mix, shake and serve your way across the universe.

name: Inscryption: Kaycee's Mod
description: Kaycee's Mod is a free mini-expansion for Inscryption that hacks Leshy‚Äôs Cabin into an endless, and increasingly challenging, roguelike. Apply different skulls to your run to ascend the Challenge Levels. Reaching new levels unlocks new cards, challenges, and dev logs inscribed by the late Kaycee Hobbes as she uncovered the secrets on the disk.

name: Gal Gun: Double Peace
description: The Gal*Gun series is centered around a protagonist who becomes Super Popular under bewildering circumstances, forcing him to fend off hordes of girls who want to confess their love to him! Using his special Pheromone Shot, he must take aim and fire at the approaching ladies to send them into states of euphoria! Meanwhile, he must confess his love to one of the beautiful heroines in this part-shooting game, part-dating sim series!

name: Monster Energy Supercross: The Official Videogame 5
description: Hold on fast to the handlebar of your bike because a new chapter of the series has finally arrived. Try Monster Energy Supercross: The Official Videogame 5 and discover the quintessence of indoor supercross! The road to become a true champion starts here. With the new career mode, you'll have to prove your skills on two-wheel bikes to be able to win glory!

name: Toziuha Night: Order of the Alchemists
description: Toziuha Night is a 2D side-scrolling action platformer with features of a metroidvania RPG. Travel through different non-linear maps set in a dark fantasy world; such as a gloomy forest, demon-infested dungeons, a ruined village and more!

name: Perseverance: Part 2
description: Perseverance is a horror/crime thriller visual novel. Play as Karen, a calculated assassin, and witness the gripping story of secrets, passion, and violence.

name: Metropocre
description: Felix is an ordinary rabbit trying to get a brand new pair of wings. To accomplish that, he must go through a bloody and unusual adventure.

name: Onde
description: Catch a wave in this smooth sound-surfing platformer: Let ethereal tunes carry you fluidly through serene abstract landscapes, tune into soothing sound spheres and revel in a meditative journey of life.

name: Missing Love
description: In the early 2000s Somewhere in America, There is a serial killer who calls himself the Love Killer who likes to murder any couple indiscriminately For five years, you'll play Elijah Sanders, a private investigator whose partner is Lieutenant Anthony Williams. victim woman named Kate Hernandez.

name: Battle Bands: Rock & Roll Deckbuilder
description: Get the band together and take on the world in this battle of the bands, deckbuilding card game set in the fantasy land of Riff City. Play solo or with friends to conquer competitive real-time tournaments or offbeat bosses in a coop campaign. Wits and a sick riff are key to becoming a rock legend.

name: Clutter 1000
description: The greatest Clutter yet! Clutter 1000 is the most exciting Un-Hidden Object game you will ever play. The object of the game? It's simple: click on two matching objects to remove them from the playfield. Along with your old favorites there are twice as many new variations, for days of fun!

name: Lost Egg 2: Be Together
description: That fragile but brave egg has come back with new powers. A hard action adventure game about the fragility, bravery, and sometimes friendship of raw eggs. Aim for the frying pan at the end of rolling through various stages with sad and touching melody.

name: No Place Like Home
description: Humanity trashed the Earth and left for Mars. Only few remained. Explore the world. Clean the environment, Craft with recycled resources. Domesticate animals. Rebuild your village. Restore environment and run your own post-apo farm as there is 'No Place Like Home'!

name: Anno: Mutationem
description: Anno: Mutationem set up a near future Metropolis after the catastrophy. Moreover, they‚Äôve introduced the famous open-sourced work series ‚ÄúSCP Foundation‚Äù in to the world of Anno: Mutationem, to mix the creative ideas of authors from all over the world.

name: Digimon Emerald Project
description: A Digimon rom hack of Pokemon Emerald which features 350+ new monsters with unique stats, abilities, typing, and movepools built from the ground-up,as many as five to six stages for prominent Digimon, custom moves from the Digimon canon, Digidex Entries state criteria for evolution, EV/IV Checker, Up to Gen VII Abilities and Moves, Reusable TMs, Fairy Type, Physical-Special Split, Poison Survival, BW Repel System, and much more.

name: Solares
description: Test your puzzle solving skills in the grid-based city of Solares. Move boxes to their colored locations by using switches and devices with new mechanics.

name: Flagle
description:
Guess the hidden flag in six tries.
After each guess, pixels of the solution that overlap with the guessed flag will be revealed.

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate: Variety Pack 6XS
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Sprinkler & Ghost
description: A Survival game where you must dodge the ghost and been shot from the sprinkler!

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces: Fantastical Waterfalls
description: This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces".

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces: Hawaii - Most Beautiful Places in the World
description: This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces".

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces: Hokkaido - Most beautiful places in Japan
description: This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces".

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces: World Heritage Site 3
description: This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces".

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces: Little Animals
description: This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces".

name: Retro64
description: A mod which adds Mario from Super Mario 64, complete with all his abilities and physics, to Minecraft. This mod needs both Minecraft and Super Mario 64.

name: My Hero One's Justice 2: DLC Pack 9 - Midnight
description: Play as Midnight in My Hero One's Justice 2! This pack also includes 10 color variations for Midnight's costume.

name: I'm Borr
description:
I'm Borr is an exciting puzzle game with laser cannons, mirrors and
magic artifacts. It will take you to a strange fantasy world and exercise your brain!

name: Bunny Bundle 2
description: Bunny Bundle 2 is bundle of games with cute grey Bunnies to challenge your mental skills and friendship.

name: Cat Adventure 2
description: Do you love complex platform games with beautiful graphics? Then the game Cat Adventure 2 will be a real find for you. In this game you will face the most difficult traps and obstacles that you will encounter on the way. Pass the most difficult levels and rush to victory in this game!

name: Out of Order
description: A collaborative roguelite sorting game for up to 4 players. Earn coins, purchase items, upgrade your skills, and even discover pets! How many rounds can you survive? Join Martin and his friends to help bring order to the forest.

name: Smudge Coin Run
description: Smudge Coin Run is a Free to Play Endless Run game based on the Smudge Meme Coin. Collect as many Coins as you can and buy some cool skins for your cute smudge Cat! Try to get to the top of the leaderboard to get some nice gifts and prizes!

name: ModBots
description: ModBots is a third-person arena rogue-like in which players play as robots fighting through randomized arena layouts against hordes of grunt robots and larger gladiators. As the players advance, they gain upgrades and weapons to enhance their abilities to fight and survive in the everchanging arena!

name: Spirit Detective
description: Spirit Detective is a realistic Oriental culture, 1V5 asymmetric competitive game launched by QL Studio. The game is based on the all-embracing traditional Oriental culture and designed to let players experience the charm of traditional Oriental strange culture.

name: Endustry
description: Endustry is a game about building, exploring and surviving. Build machines and conveyor belts to collect resources.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic
description: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic is a reimagining of the 3D Platformer but told through a unique, pinball format. End the witch‚Äôs wicked schemes and conquer her many challenges. Prove once and for all, that you are the true pinball champion!

name: Vikingard
description: Celebrate Vikingard's one-year anniversary with an epic adventure featuring even more characters from MGM's hit TV series, Vikings, including the legendary Bjorn and fierce warrior Ubbe. Ragnar and other fan favorite characters from the first collaboration will be back.

name: Velocity Legends: Action Racing Game
description: Immerse yourself in one of the arcade action racing games, stunning visual and particle effects and epic action that turn every race into a real blockbuster race movie.

name: Shredders
description: Break into the snowboarding event of the year in the hope of scoring a wildcard entry to an exclusive invitational. To prove you‚Äôre up to the challenge, master the art of park riding, buttering, rails, and massive kickers and earn your place in the world of snowboarding.

name: HopeLine
description: HopeLine is a classic theme of survival games. you need to overcome struggles such as hunger, thirst and cold,And encounter beasts and zombies. Make a fire,Build shelters. Kill animals for meat, Or you need to kill other players to protect yourself. Do everything possible to survive.

name: Slurpy Derpy
description: Breed ever-stronger Derps. Use them to Bake, Conquer, Research and Evolve!

name: Basketball Trivia
description: How well do you know your Basketball Trivia?

name: Office Management 101
description: Take reign of a consumer electronics company in this lighthearted business sim reminiscent of the classics of the genre. Design and build your workplace, hire staff and manage projects in a game riddled with office humor and corporate satire.

name: Luminary: Rise of the GoonZu
description: Luminary: Rise of the GoonZu

name: Tunic
description: Tunic is an action adventure about a tiny fox in a big world. Explore the wilderness, discover spooky ruins, and fight terrible creatures from long ago.

name: The Dividing Line
description: A short game set outside Ace Attorney canon, this game has multiple endings with branching paths with even 'incorrect' choices leading to something new.

name: Fantasy Mosaics 53: Mysterious Cosmos
description: Una and Aaron were traveling to visit their home galaxy when a black hole appeared out of nowhere! Suddenly their spacecraft started to get sucked into it. Let's explore the unknown Cosmos and make sure everything is safe with the Penguins while discovering new puzzles and mini games.

name: Omaku
description: Omaku is a top down action adventure game, where you explore a huge interconnected world, without any hints or hand holding. Everything is cryptic and the game is quite challenging, so prepare to feel lost and frustrated. But if you persevere, you may find something beautiful in it.

name: Grand Theft Auto V: Story Mode
description: Grand Theft Auto V: Story Mode is an add-on for the standalone version of Grand Theft Auto Online. Players can experience the interwoven stories of Franklin, Michael, and Trevor across the sun-soaked metropolis of Los Santos and the backwoods' countryside of Blaine County in greater detail than ever before with stunning all new levels of visual detail. The game shares the same San Andreas map, although set in 2013.

name: Quizl
description: Quizl is a daily trivia game where each day there will be a new set of questions to answer. The questions are individually picked and test all areas of knowledge. Your scores are then marked out of five and added to your stats page. There are also additional game modes and features.

name: Lisa: The Oblivious
description:
Lisa: the Oblivious is a fangame based on LISA: the Painful, revolving around Sticky Angoneli and Richard Weeks.

Oblivious delves into the past of Brad's former friends, what their lives and relationships were like and the decisions they made leading up to the Painful.

Weighed down by the consequences of their actions, our protagonists are confronted with a rocky, twisting path that will teach them what it really means to live with the choices they've made.

name: Cold Bed on Route
description: "Cold Bed on Route" is an equation-like rogue-lite adventure game.

name: Summoned by a Magic Goddess
description:
From a nobody to a hero, this is your new life in a fantasy realm!

After a sudden accident you are thrown into a fantasy world filled with elves, dwarves, and other magical creatures! Magic is everywhere, but for some reason you are stuck fighting the old fashioned way. Hardly very heroic, but you quickly find yourself in a team of beautiful girls that definitely make you feel much better!

Defend your group from monsters as you make your way across the vast land, and maybe discover a spark of romantic magic‚Ä¶

Can you fulfill your destiny and become a hero, or will you fall to the power of the gods?

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege: Demon Veil
description: Rainbow Six Siege introduces the first season of Year 7, Demon Veil! It features Azami, a new Defender from Japan, a brand new map, a permanent game mode: Team Deathmatch, and more. Azami can shut down sightlines, block off entry points, and create entirely new angles of defense all with a flick of her wrist.

name: Lingo Legend
description:
Learn a language while gaming! Master over 3000 of the most important words and phrases in an immersive fantasy world. Crush your learning goals and your enemies!

Test your language skills in strategic monster battles. Draw ability cards from a personalized deck and answer language flashcards to play them.

Developed by language acquisition experts, Lingo Legend contains over 200 categories of grammar, vocabulary, and common phrases to learn from. It‚Äôs the perfect app to compliment or kick-start your language learning journey.

name: Deadlocked
description:
Welcome to Darkvale, you arrive at the outskirts amidst the endless hordes of undead.
It would be better to leave this place and you'd be wise to heed this advice.
Run through distinct biomes while avoiding environmental hazards and obstacles. Defeat undead hordes and gruesome bosses. Select your weapon and upgrade it to suit your playstyle. Acquire new skills and best your enemies.

name: Peril
description: Peril is an action adventure 2d platformer created using Unreal Engine 4. In this game the main character must battle through various worlds and defeat many enemies, all the while using a javelin as both a weapon and a tool to reach new places.

name: Wordbreaker by Powgi
description: Wordbreaker is a code-breaking game using letters. Each word‚Äôll tell you which letters are used, and which are in the correct place. Your reward for solving each puzzle is a terrible joke!

name: Medusa's Heart of Stone: Chapter 01
description: Medusa's Heart of Stone is a 2D narrative driven game with action sequences, puzzles and quest interspersed throughout. Feared by mortals and forsaken by the gods, Medusa embarks on a journey to find someone who could love her.

name: Tiny Islands
description: Tiny Islands is a low poly Point&Click game where you have to find all the ancient artifacts in beautiful worlds.

name: Frog Familiar
description:
Explore a tranquil and mysterious forest while you gather ingredients for a witch's potion.

In this game you play as a little frog who works for a kindly witch. In order for the witch to brew a new potion, you must wander around the forest gathering herbs, mushrooms, and other items. Along the way you will meet a variety of humans, critters, and spirits, some of who could use your help! Can you find all of the items for the potion, including a rare magical crystal?

name: Automoji
description: Automoji is a Auto-Battle, strategy game with Emojis and light roguelike elements.

name: The Ultimate Shot
description: You are the only hope, but thanks to your rich experience we are sure you will do well!

name: Quadratic Puzzle 4
description: "Quadratic puzzle 4" is a beautiful girl puzzle game made by "Rabbit studio", with multiple puzzle modes, challenge your fastest record!

name: Tegridy Puzzles
description: Tegridy Puzzles Is A Jigsaw Puzzle Game Designed For Relaxing.

name: Blocknator
description: In this game, your objective is to fit the pieces on the board to accumulate points. When you complete one or more floors, the pieces are destroyed and you earn points. It‚Äôs that simple!

name: Winter
description: Face mythical creatures from ancient mythologies face to face, create an army and fight back before winter swallows you.

name: Deg-Deg the Ravenous
description: An SRPG inspired by Fire Emblem/Tactics Ogre about Goblins.

name: Deadburg
description: Deadburg is a co-op survival game set in a procedurally generated city with thousands of buildings to explore and zombies to kill. Every building you see can be explored, exploited and destroyed one block at a time. Play alone or with friends and discover the secrets of the city.

name: Hidden Objects: Tranquil Valley
description: Immerse yourself in the peaceful environment of Tranquil Valley. Find objects without pressure in Zen mode or put your sleuthing skills to the test in Time Attack mode.

name: One Step After Fall
description: Immerse yourself in the depressing thoughts of Steve Robinson, learn his story and face your fate in this incredible narrative experience.

name: Einherjar
description: Einherjar is a combination RTS and turn-based game, with roguelike elements. Defend against waves of enemies as your territory expands, and the opposition becomes tougher, while building up your base and defending and upgrading your resources.

name: Elf World Adventure: Part 1
description: You are gamer who likes to play computer games. One day, returning home from the store, along the way you became a victim of an accident. At the last moment you think that your story is over, but some force has given you a second chance in another world that is completely different from yours.

name: RoguePG
description: RoguePG is a strategic rogue-lite game with turn-based elements. Each run features a new band of heroes, each with unique actions and powerful skills. Upgrade your actions, find new skills, and discover game-altering baubles in your quest to conquer three floors of enemies.

name: Hypermind
description: Hypermind is a first-person puzzle game inspired by Portal. As a tester, you have been given four powerful abilities, and you will need to solve a series of interesting puzzles with combinations of these abilities and a touch of imagination.

name: Two Point Hospital: Speedy Recovery
description: Everyday thousands of citizens hurt themselves in new and amusing ways. A traditional ambulance is no match for the perils of today, lucky for us, the County‚Äôs brightest minds are up to the task!

name: Ponchoman
description: Kill the creatures and upgrade your weapon to survive as much as you can.

name: Fire on Fight: Online Multiplayer Shooter
description: Fire On Fight : Online Multiplayer Shooter is a competitive online multiplayer first person shooter game with stunning 3D graphics and captivating gameplay.

name: Samsara
description: Samsara VR won many international VR awards, including the Jury Award of SXSW. In Samsara, the audiences are transformed into different beings' bodies and experience the world from new perspectives.

developers.name: Virtual and Physical Media Integration Association of Taiwan

name: Batsumaru
description: Batrsumaru is a short and minimalist puzzle game.

name: Civitas
description: Civitas is a city and world builder game inspired by Renaissance map artwork. Using procedurally formed landscapes, this sandbox-style game allows you the freedom to bring your Medieval and Renaissance cities to life without the pressure of survival. Escape into a world of your own creation!

name: Auto World Tycoon
description: Auto World Tycoon is the next tycoon game from Diggidy.net. Based in real-time with full day night rotations as well as varying weather, players can purchase and own from over 30 different businesses.

name: Stern
description: Anarchy and lawlessness flourish in the city, and at the same time, due to the explosion of a chemical plant, all residents inhabiting the city are turning into unknown creatures and creatures that crave human flesh. No more rules and laws!

name: Lazy Galaxy 2
description: Lazy Galaxy 2 is an idle/clicker game with base-building and RTS elements. Lead an evil (albeit lazy) alien race to conquer the universe! Expand your base, fight vicious foes, and conquer the galaxies. Acquire combat experience and convert into candy, the most precious alien resource!

name: Aethernaut
description: AETHERNAUT is a first person puzzle game in the vein of Portal and Talos Principle. Use light, sensors, portals and time travel to gather the aether vials and access the core of the Construct.

name: Pok√©mon Corogarena
description: Pok√©mon Corogarena is a Japanese exclusive arcade game medal game by Sega.

name: Interstice Academy: Love is Blind
description:
Sitting at the point between worlds, time and space lies a school for beings of all kinds. Welcome to Interstice Academy!

Team Milk Chocolate's entry for Project Blind Date, a one month production jam hosted by the Newgrounds Festivals Server.

name: Flagdle
description: Flagdle is a daily guessing game where players are presented with an image of a flag, and must guess the corresponding country or territory within six guesses. Each incorrect guess informs the player how similar their guess is to the target flag.

name: Super Metroid: Harvest
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Flooder
description: Can you flood the entire screen with a single color in less than 25 moves? Test your wits with this fun puzzle game.

name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Ascending Tide
description: The Legacy of the Bretons year-long story starts here! Strange things are happening in the Coral Aerie and Shipwright's Regret as old rivalries, ancient history, and the birthright of the Bretons come into focus and lead to the upcoming High Isle Chapter.

name: Nobelia
description: Nobelia is a cross between Zelda and Bomberman in which players must travel the world and solve puzzles to collect seven legendary golden coins.

name: Wizard is Rolling
description: Pick your skills and roll 4 wizard dices. If the dice combination matches, you will cast extraordinary magic spells. Let's roll for an epic adventure. More than 70 skills with different dice combination. Build your mighty wizard to fight against more than 70 unique monsters.

name: Battle Alliance
description: This a strategy game all about enemy troops trying to break through your defences at any cost. Choose a location, plan your strategy and lead your troops to victory. You alone decide how to use budget available to you ‚Äì to buy new weapons or to improve and strengthen existing ones. A number of weapons systems (infantry, artillery, high-tech weapons, navy) are available to you. Since the enemy attacks with different kinds of units, it is essential to make the right choice and the right placement. However, make sure that you have only limited resources available and that the weapons systems have different characteristics. If the situation gets too tricky, you'll need air support. But be careful. The enemy has the same options as you! The intelligently designed maps and the wide selection of weapons open up a variety of tactical possibilities and countless hours of entertainment.

name: Jade Dynasty: New Fantasy
description:
Jade Dynasty: New Fantasy presents the eight sects and classic plot in the popular novel Jade Dynasty. With advanced technology the game not only presents the classic eighteen areas but also expanded the world! The Mortal Realm is within your reach.
In this world there are so many amazing things for you to see! You can ride a sword and fly into the sky or down into the ocean. Wherever you go, you can find something new! The game involved elements, terrains and brand new turn-based combat system, which means every step you take can make a difference!

name: Heart attack
description: There are ghosts in the dark, in order to survive you need to light your way, but all the items for this are limited.

name: Haunted Hotel: The Thirteenth - Collector's Edition
description: No good deed goes unpunished‚Ä¶

name: The Creature of Chaos
description: Frantic FPS game with very procedural levels

name: 1001 Jigsaw: Cute Cats
description: A new game in the series of 1001 Puzzles. Cute, funny, cozy cats will melt even the coldest hearts! Assemble the puzzle pieces and enjoy the cute faces of pets.

name: Mahjong Business Style
description: Become a business shark ‚Äì play Mahjong on the exchange! Complete more than 100 levels, earning points and countless trophies. Each pack embodies a separate market ‚Äì from stocks to advanced technologies‚Äîand each level contains special high-value gold pieces to collect! Enjoy classic levels or challenge yourself with levels that include wandering pieces, in which the arrangement of the tokens changes with each new attempt! Climb the ladder of success and Wall Street will bow to you!

name: Hidden Shapes: Animals + Lovely Cats
description: Hidden Shapes: Lovely Cats + Animals is a collection with two beautiful and relaxing minimalist hand-drawn jigsaw puzzles that have two options to choose, cats or animals in general.

name: Mother of Many
description: "Mother of Many" is a horde killing roguetale. Harvest vegetables, make a soup with your older sister and get stronger in order to end your family's curse.

name: Drag Clash Pro: Hot Rod Racing

With Mr Bullet 3D, you'll have the possibility of becoming a spy, hunting for clumsy assassins and criminals, and shooting them down to save hostages and re-establish justice. Players receive a call from Hope, a woman trapped inside a mysterious totalitarian state, and must hack into the nation's elaborate surveillance network to guide her to freedom.

The Anniversary Edition will include developer commentary that reveal new secrets about the game's tumultuous development.

description: Aztech Forgotten Gods is the cyber-stone action-adventure following Achtli, a young woman who battles the colossal Forgotten Gods. To uncover the truth behind her far-future Mesoamerican metropolis, she'll have to turn the Gods' power against them, as she soars through the city with power and grace using an ancient artifact, remnant of a time long forgotten.

name: Potato Flowers in Full Bloom
description:
A Japanese indie game being designed as a modern take on the Dungeon RPG genre.

It has character creation with a selection for race and class, leveling up provides ability points for further customization. The game uses a party of 3 characters.

The dungeon crawling uses grid-based movement and a first-person perspective for exploration but switches to third-person for interactions with NPCs, points of interest or combat encounters.
Enemies are visible and don't appear to roam in the current gameplay. Encounters also doesn't appear to add extra enemies when combat begins.
Combat is turn-based and characters have a stamina meter, it can get dangerous if not managed as even blocking requires a set amount. The enemy's actions are indicated above them to help the player decide on their actions each turn.

name: Distant Worlds 2
description:
Distant Worlds 2 is a vast, pausable real-time 4X space strategy game. Experience the full depth and detail of turn-based strategy, but with the simplicity and ease of real-time, and on the scale of a massively-multiplayer online game. The Universe is Yours!

Huge Galaxies with up to 2,000 star systems and tens of thousands of planets, moons and asteroids are yours to explore and exploit, whether peacefully through mining and diplomacy or by conquest! The complex process of generating a galaxy ensures that every new game will be different and the many galaxy setup options ensure incredible replayability as well as the ability to have your game be just the way you like it.

Summer is coming. The entire crew is having a three-day camp together where they meet someone unexpected. Will the truth behind the family be uncovered? What future awaits them? Follow Clena and the animal boys in this fun and heartwarming finale!

name: Anicon: Animal Complex

Clena, your average everyday girl, finds herself in front of a circus filled with lovely animals. However, she quickly discovers that they are not ordinary animals ‚Äî they are actually human boys who can transform into animals!

To ensure her silence, she has no choice but to work under them - cleaning, sweeping, and keeping things in order - or at least, that is how it appears on the surface. Their underlying goal, however, is for her to fall in love with one of the boys!

The circus is in town! Or more like, the performing arts club is here and you've been dragged into it! Souin High School's smallest club is on the brink of disbandment and you've been roped into helping them gather more members.

There's never a dull moment when you‚Äôre with these passionate performers. Get whipped into shape as you juggle your new club responsibilities with the affections of its members.

Can you really save the circus?

New at management? Surely things will run smoothly with extra helping paws! Hire from a pool of well-intentioned animal weirdos to help you to run the restaurant as you decorate it to fulfill your (or your clients‚Äô) specific tastes. Maki this caf√© into your home!

Practice makes perfect! Be sure to check on your restaurant every day to progress on your sushi skills, level up the status of your restaurant, and learn more about your staff‚Äôs outlandish life stories!

Are you ready to become a top Sushi chef?!

It puts a lot of emphasis on atmosphere and immersion with lots of written text, carefully picked music, and fitting visuals that paint a colorful world of an exotic tropical archipelago. name: Dead by Daylight: Sadako Rising Chapter
description: Sadako Rising features a new Killer ‚Äì The Onry≈ç ‚Äì and a new Survivor, Yoichi Asakawa. Purchasing this add-on also unlocks an exclusive charm: Cursed Videotape.

description: A sweet, slow burn yuri romance story about a grumpy, socially awkward writer and her cheery, happy-go-lucky fan set in the Japanese countryside.
